Package de.mrapp.android.validation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Constraint<Type>
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to verify, whether a specific type satisfies a constraint, must implement.
    Validateable<Type>
    Defines the interface, a view, whose value should be able to be validated, must implement.
    ValidationListener<Type>
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when a view has been validated, must implement.
    Validator<Type>
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be able to validate values of a specific type, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractValidateableView<ViewType extends View,ValueType>
    An abstract base class for all views, whose value should be able to be validated according to the pattern, which is suggested by the Material Design guidelines.
    AbstractValidateableView.SavedState
    A data structure, which allows to save the internal state of an AbstractValidateableView.
    Constraints
    An utility class, which provides factory methods, which allow to create various constraints.
    EditText
    A view, which allows to enter text.
    EditText.SavedState
    A data structure, which allows to save the internal state of an EditText.
    PasswordEditText
    A view, which allows to enter a password.
    Spinner
    A view, which allows to choose a value from a drop down menu.
    Spinner.SavedState
    A data structure, which allows to save the internal state of a Spinner.
    Validators
    An utility class, which provides factory methods, which allow to create various validators.
